text: Sistani may refer to: *Sistan, a historical and geographical region in eastern Iran *Sistani Persian people, who mainly inhabit Iran, Afghanistan and Pakistan *Sistani Language *Sistani (surname) *Sistani Mahalleh, a village in Iran *Tolombeh-ye Habib Sistani, a village in Iran *Vahdapar va Arbandi Sistani, a village in Iran
title: Sistani
